decision_conditions: <p>The proposed lightwell, by reason of its location, would result in the loss of a space currently used for waste storage necessitating the movement of these bins into a public highway resulting in a reduction in the quality of the highway contrary to LP2 'Development and Amenity' of the Hackney local plan and T2 'Healthy Streets' the London plan.<br></p>

<p>The proposed lightwell, by reason of its location, would result in the loss of a space currently used for waste storage necessitating the movement of these bins into a public highway resulting in a reduction in the quality of the highway contrary to LP2 'Development and Amenity' of the Hackney local plan and&nbsp;T2 'Healthy Streets' the London plan.<br></p>

<p>The proposed front lightwell and associated works, by reason of its detailed design, size, and location, would result in unsympathetic and uncharacteristic alterations which would fail to compliment the host dwellinghouse and the terrace of which it forms part.&nbsp; The proposal would, therefore, fail to preserve or enhance the character and appearance of the conservation area.&nbsp; As such the proposal is contrary to policies D3 (Optimising site capacity through the design-led approach), D4 (Delivering good design), and HC1 (Heritage conservation and growth) of the London Plan (2021), policies LP1 (Design Quality and Local Character) and LP3 (Designated Heritage Assets) of the Hackney Local Plan (2020) and the recommendations of the Supplementary Planning Document: Residential Extensions and Alterations 2009.<br></p>

<p>The proposal development, by reason of inadequate levels of light, outlook and ventilation to the proposed habitable basement, would provide substandard accommodation and living conditions to prospective future users, contrary to the requirements of LP17 'Housing Design' of the Hackney Local Plan (2020) and policy D6 'Housing quality and standards' of the London Plan&nbsp; (2021) as well as the guidelines of the Residential Extensions and Alterations SPD (2009).<br></p>
description: Basement extension with front and rear lightwells and associated works.
